subject: history
title: British Colonial Period - Grade 9
content:
# British Colonial Period - Grade 9

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand the historical significance of British Conquest, Kandyan Convention, Colonial Rule
- Analyze causes and effects of historical events
- Evaluate the impact on Sri Lankan and world history

## Historical Context
This lesson examines British Colonial Period, with particular focus on British Conquest, Kandyan Convention, Colonial Rule. We will explore how these events
shaped Sri Lankan society and its place in world history.

## Timeline
Key dates and events will be discussed

## Main Content
This section covers British Conquest, Kandyan Convention, Colonial Rule. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Key Historical Figures
Important historical figures relevant to this period

## Primary Sources
Students will analyze historical documents, photographs, and artifacts from this period.

## Discussion Questions
1. What were the main causes of B?
2. How did these events affect Sri Lankan society?
3. What lessons can we learn from this period?

## Assessment
Essays, timeline projects, source analysis, and presentations.

## Resources
- History textbook for Grade 9
- National Archives of Sri Lanka
- Museum artifacts and photographs
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to British Colonial Period
